sentences.en: "There are other patients on the ward, Lovell," the staff nurse reminded her tartly.
sentences.cn: “洛弗尔，病房里还有别的病人呢，”护士毫不客气地提醒她说。

sentences.en: Kay said tartly, " And you're more Yankee than Italian.
sentences.cn: 恺酸溜溜他说: “ 可你哪,与其说是意大利人,还不如说是新英格兰人.

sentences.en: Never mind your immortal soul, she said tartly.
sentences.cn: “千万不要提及你不朽的灵魂, ”她刻薄地说.

sentences.en: Never mind your immortal soul,'she said tartly.
sentences.cn: ‘千万不要提及你不朽的灵魂, ’ 她尖酸地说.

sentences.en: She finished by tartly pointing out that he owed her some money.
sentences.cn: 她最后刻薄地指出他欠她一些钱.

sentences.en: She finished tartly pointing out that he owed her some money.
sentences.cn: 她最后“刻薄”地指出他欠她一些钱.
